counter strike is a great game full of building and creating whatever you desire. truly a game where one can play to expand the imagination, designing amazing and beautiful worlds through the marvelous single-player campaign, or collaborating with others to make a dream come true in the multiplayer. not sure how I feel about the tonal shift between the counting/ shapes matching sections but aside from that a great, fluid experience. play now and fuck you
Best shooter  game ever playing since 12 years old:)

Cancer around every corner! Jump into a shooter with micspam galore! Get yelled at by try hards in competitive play who make you want to uninstall, or listen to the same tired jokes over and over again in casual! Every now and then convos will turn to politics, racism, religion and other fun subjects!

A game is not complete without transacts though! Gamble in opening cases for skins that will make 11 year olds drool, or empty your back account for a pair of gloves! 

Eventually find a squad to fit your play style whether it's fun, modded, or competitive there is plenty to enjoy while shooting your guns!
Very Fun and enjoyable the people on this game also make others laugh recommend for all to try!
This game is exceptional and stands the test of time. Almost a decade of consistent fun and nonstop encounters of the eccentric community members. 10/10 would tell you off in this game.
